casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert BISHOP. No. 223PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Bishop, Robert. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Calvin Scott Meyers, Raleigh, Attorney at Law, for Electronic Frontier Foundation. Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of September 2015 by Electronic Frontier Foundation for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
